con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="DirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:topupSyncForMipay="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mipay/" xmlns:tns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:registerForThresholdEvent="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/registerforthresholdevent/" xmlns:queryStatusForThresEvent="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/querystatusregisterforthesholdevent/" xmlns:opInfo="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/operationinfo/" xmlns:fault="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/fault/" xmlns:deregisterForThresholdEvent="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/deregisterforthresholdevent/"> <wsdl:import location="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?wsdl=queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent/QueryStatusRegisterForThresholdEventDefault.wsdl" namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/querystatusregisterforthesholdevent/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:import location="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?wsdl=topupSynchronous/TopupSynchronousForMipay.wsdl" namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mipay/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:import location="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?wsdl=deregisterForThresholdEvent/DeregisterForThresholdEventDefault.wsdl" namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/deregisterforthresholdevent/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:import location="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?wsdl=registerForThresholdEvent/RegisterForThresholdEventDefault.wsdl" namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/registerforthresholdevent/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:import location="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?wsdl=operationInfo/OperationInfoDefault.wsdl" namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/operationinfo/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:portType name="DirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipayPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="topupSynchronous"> <wsdl:input message="topupSyncForMipay:topupSynchronous" name="topupSynchronous"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="topupSyncForMipay:topupSynchronousResponse" name="topupSynchronousResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="topupSyncForMipay:topupSynchronousFault" name="topupSynchronousFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="operationInfo"> <wsdl:input message="opInfo:operationInfo" name="operationInfo"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="opInfo:operationInfoResponse" name="operationInfoResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="opInfo:operationInfoFault" name="operationInfoFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="registerForThresholdEvent"> <wsdl:input message="registerForThresholdEvent:registerForThresholdEvent" name="registerForThresholdEvent"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="registerForThresholdEvent:registerForThresholdEventResponse" name="registerForThresholdEventResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="registerForThresholdEvent:registerForThresholdEventFault" name="registerForThresholdEventFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deregisterForThresholdEvent"> <wsdl:input message="deregisterForThresholdEvent:deregisterForThresholdEvent" name="deregisterForThresholdEvent"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="deregisterForThresholdEvent:deregisterForThresholdEventResponse" name="deregisterForThresholdEventResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="deregisterForThresholdEvent:deregisterForThresholdEventFault" name="deregisterForThresholdEventFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent"> <wsdl:input message="queryStatusForThresEvent:queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent" name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="queryStatusForThresEvent:queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventResponse" name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="queryStatusForThresEvent:queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventFault" name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="DirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipaySoapBinding" type="tns:DirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipayPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="topupSynchronous"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="topupSynchronous"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="topupSynchronousResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="topupSynchronousFault"> <soap:fault name="topupSynchronousFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="operationInfo"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="operationInfo"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="operationInfoResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="operationInfoFault"> <soap:fault name="operationInfoFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="registerForThresholdEvent"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="registerForThresholdEvent"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="registerForThresholdEventResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="registerForThresholdEventFault"> <soap:fault name="registerForThresholdEventFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deregisterForThresholdEvent"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="deregisterForThresholdEvent"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="deregisterForThresholdEventResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="deregisterForThresholdEventFault"> <soap:fault name="deregisterForThresholdEventFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventFault"> <soap:fault name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="DirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipayService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:DirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipaySoapBinding" name="DirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipayPort"> <soap:address location="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/querystatusregisterforthesholdevent/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:base="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" xmlns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/querystatusregisterforthesholdevent/"> <xs:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=xsd/Base.xsd"/> <xs:simpleType name="isRegistered"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Registration status general.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="isRegisteredForPsp"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Registration status for this PSP.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> <!--Request component--> <xs:element name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent" type="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent"/> <xs:complexType name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEvent" type="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventDto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventDto"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="msisdn" type="base:msisdn"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Response component--> <xs:element name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventResponse" type="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventResult" type="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventResultDto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventResultDto"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="isRegistered" type="isRegistered"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="isRegisteredForPsp" type="isRegisteredForPsp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Fault component--> <xs:element name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventFault" type="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventFault"/> <xs:complexType name="queryStatusRegisterForThesholdEventFault"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="fault" type="base:drcFault"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/"> <xs:simpleType name="correlationId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ID for financial tracking. Example: 5512345678</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\d{9,15}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="status"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="currency"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Currency in ISO4217-currency-code style.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="EUR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Euro curreny code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="application"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Application name of the client-system</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\w*"/> <!--no special character like '%', '$', or '-' but '_' is valid--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="referenceId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>An alpha numeric string (e.g. order ID). This referenceId must be unique (in minimum last 365 days). Drc proposes a rising serial number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <!--an alpha numeric string, with a max length of 32 characters--> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="32"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="serviceProviderId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Service provider ID as SAS-Code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="subscriptionId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>For future use.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount in euro cent.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:totalDigits fixed="false" value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="opReference"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The unique ID for operation assigned by OCS, e.g.: abcde12345678.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="32"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="monetaryAmountType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>amount value in euro cent.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:totalDigits fixed="false" value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="voucherCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Voucher code to be redeemed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="msisdn"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid MSISDN. DRC preference a msisdn-shape of: 4917612304567</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="(\+49|0049|49|0)[1-9]\d{8,11}"/> <!--only digits, MSISDN like 0176/1234589 is not allowed--> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="balances"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="6" minOccurs="0" name="balance" type="tns:balance"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="balance"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Data type for all kind of balances.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="balanceType" type="tns:balanceType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The balance type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="amount" type="tns:amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The amount in the smallest currency unit, e.g. in cent for Euro.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="currency" type="tns:currency"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The currency unit in ISO4217-currency-code style.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="balanceType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All kind of valid balance types.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Balance type for future use.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="2"> <!--main balance--> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Balance type indicates the default main-balance.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Balance type indicates virtual balance.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="4"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Balance type for future use.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="5"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Balance type for future use.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="6"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Balance type for future use.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="paymentUseCase"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>payment use case configuration</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="originator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The originator describes where the fault occurs.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DRC"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Within the drc-core-server.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Piranha"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Within the piranha database.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OCS"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Within the OCS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="VOMS"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Within the voucher managment system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="drcFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fault contains different error informations.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element default="false" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="retryPossible" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Describes if this fault is transient or permanent. If the flag is TRUE, the client might retry the request otherwise not.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="originator" type="tns:originator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The originator describes where the fault occurs.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="originatorMessage" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Original description of the error code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="errorCode" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains the originator error code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Text message which describes why this drc fault occurs in the processing chain.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="correlationId" type="tns:correlationId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ID for financial tracking.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<wsdl:definitions name="TopupSynchronousForMipay" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mipay/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:topupSyncDefault="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mipay/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mipay/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=topupSynchronous/TopupSynchronousForMipay.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="topupSynchronousResponse"> <wsdl:part element="topupSyncDefault:topupSynchronousResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="topupSynchronousFault"> <wsdl:part element="topupSyncDefault:topupSynchronousFault" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="topupSynchronous"> <wsdl:part element="topupSyncDefault:topupSynchronous" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mipay/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:baseTopupMipay="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topup/mipay/" xmlns:base="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" xmlns:balanceDefault="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/balance/" xmlns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mipay/"> <xs:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topup/mipay/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=xsd/BaseTopupForMipay.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=xsd/Base.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/balance/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=xsd/BalanceDefault.xsd"/> <xs:element name="topupSynchronous" type="topupSynchronous"/> <xs:element name="topupSynchronousResponse" type="topupSynchronousResponse"/> <xs:element name="topupSynchronousFault" type="topupSynchronousFault"/> <xs:complexType name="topupSynchronous"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="DirectRechargeServiceTopupDtoWithVoucherID" type="baseTopupMipay:directRechargeServiceTopupDto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="topupSynchronousResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="DirectRechargeServiceTopupResultWithBalancesDto" type="directRechargeServiceTopupResultWithBalancesDto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="topupSynchronousFault"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="fault" type="base:drcFault"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="request" type="baseTopupMipay:directRechargeServiceTopupDto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="directRechargeServiceTopupResultWithBalancesDto"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="baseTopupMipay:directRechargeServiceTopupDto"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="6" minOccurs="1" name="balances" type="balanceDefault:balance"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="correlationId" type="base:correlationId"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topup/mipay/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:base="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" xmlns:balanceDefault="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/balance/" xmlns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topup/mipay/"> <xs:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/balance/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=xsd/BalanceDefault.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=xsd/Base.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="directRechargeServiceTopupDto"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="amount" type="base:amount"/> <xs:element default="2" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="balanceType" type="base:balanceType"/> <xs:element default="EUR" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="currency" type="base:currency"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="gratificationDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="msisdn" type="base:msisdn"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="referenceId" type="base:referenceId"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="serviceProviderId" type="base:serviceProviderId"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="subscriptionId" type="base:serviceProviderId"/> <xs:element default="FULL_WITH_SMS" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="paymentUseCase" type="base:paymentUseCase"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="voucherCode" type="base:voucherCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/balance/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:base="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" xmlns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/balance/"> <xs:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=xsd/Base.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="balance"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Data type for all kind of balances.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="amount" type="base:amount"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="currency" type="base:currency"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="ID" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<wsdl:definitions name="OperationInfoDefault" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/operationinfo/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:opInfo="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/operationinfo/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/operationinfo/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=operationInfo/OperationInfoDefault.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="operationInfoResponse"> <wsdl:part element="opInfo:operationInfoResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="operationInfoFault"> <wsdl:part element="opInfo:operationInfoFault" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="operationInfo"> <wsdl:part element="opInfo:operationInfo" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/operationinfo/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:base="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" xmlns="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/operationinfo/"> <xs:import namespace="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/base/" schemaLocation="http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8780/drc/ws/PlainDirectRechargeEvolutionServiceForMipay?xsd=xsd/Base.xsd"/> <xs:simpleType name="operationIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The identifier of the operation the info is for.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="32"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="statusMessage"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>String representation of the status of the operation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="128"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="externalReferenceId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Field with ID of the invoking application.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="32"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Request component--> <xs:element name="operationInfo" type="operationInfo"/> <xs:complexType name="operationInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="operationInfoDto" type="operationInfoDto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="operationInfoDto"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="operationIdentifier" type="operationIdentifier"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="msisdn" type="base:msisdn"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="status" type="base:status"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="statusMessage" type="statusMessage"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="executionTime" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="externalReferenceId" type="externalReferenceId"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="correlationId" type="base:correlationId"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Response component--> <xs:element name="operationInfoResponse" type="operationInfoResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="operationInfoResponse"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <!--Fault component--> <xs:element name="operationInfoFault" type="operationInfoFault"/> <xs:complexType name="operationInfoFault"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="fault" type="base:drcFault"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="request" type="operationInfoDto"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
